AI-Powered

Your AI dispatcher that never sleeps

Answer every call, qualify every lead, and book every job—automatically. Thorbis AI handles customer conversations 24/7 so you never miss an opportunity.

Join WaitlistWatch Demo
Live AI Conversation

Hi, my AC stopped working and it's 95 degrees. Can someone come today?

I understand that's urgent! I can get a technician to you today. What's your address so I can check availability in your area?

123 Oak Street, Austin TX 78701

Perfect! I have a technician available at 2:30 PM today. The diagnostic fee is $89. Would that work for you?

Today at 2:30 PM
Tech: Mike Johnson • Est. arrival: 2:30-3:00 PM

Less Admin Work

Everything your AI assistant can do

From first contact to booked appointment, Thorbis AI handles the entire customer journey

Intelligent Call Routing
Automatically identifies caller intent and routes to the right workflow
  • Emergency vs. routine service detection
  • Service area validation
  • Existing customer recognition
Smart Scheduling
Books appointments based on tech availability, location, and job type
  • Real-time availability checks
  • Travel time optimization
  • Automated confirmations & reminders
Natural Conversations
Sounds human, understands context, and adapts to your brand voice
  • Custom greetings and scripts
  • Multi-turn conversation handling
  • Sentiment analysis & escalation
Lead Qualification
Captures key details and scores leads automatically
  • Budget and timeline questions
  • Property type and service history
  • Automatic lead scoring
CRM Integration
Every interaction logged with full transcripts and context
  • Automatic contact creation
  • Call transcripts and summaries
  • Activity timeline updates
Multi-Channel Support
Works across phone, SMS, web chat, and email
  • Unified conversation history
  • Channel-specific optimizations
  • Seamless handoffs between channels
Quick Setup, No Commitment

AI That Works for You
Not the Other Way Around

Unlike enterprise AI solutions, Thorbis AI Assistant is ready in 5 minutes. No sales demos, no month-long implementations, no pushy upsells.

Setup in 5 Minutes

Simple form, not a sales questionnaire. Just tell us your company name, business hours, and services. AI is ready to take calls immediately.

No Contracts

Pay-as-you-go pricing. Only charged for minutes actually used. Turn it off anytime if it's not working for you—no penalties.

We Fix What Doesn't Work

AI giving wrong answers? Tell us. We'll fix it within 48 hours. Your feedback directly improves the product for everyone.

Try It Risk-Free for 14 Days

No credit card required. Full access to AI Assistant. If it doesn't book more jobs and save you time, we'll refund you 100%. Zero risk.

Free migration help
1-on-1 training included
